name: Pyrenean desman
description: The Pyrenean desman, also known as the Iberian desman or trumpet rat, is a species of small semiaquatic mammal in the family Talpidae, endemic to the mountain range of the Pyrenees and mountainous areas of northwestern Iberian Peninsula. Its range covers four European countries: Andorra, Spain, France, and Portugal. It is closely related to Russian desman.
